cbinstall.name: CB Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard Tab
cbinstall.author: JoomlaJoe and Beat
cbinstall.description: Provides a User Tab that shows top Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard posts as well as forum statistics for the user.

param.name: forumType
param.label: Forum component
param.description: Choose the type of forum for integration. IMPORTANT: Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard configuration integration with CB must be enabled and fields created from that same forum configuration integration tab.

param.name: sidebarMode
param.label: Sidebar Mode
param.description: Kunena sidebar is displayed on the right of every post. This sidebar can be customized to display any information so desired using the various supported modes.

param.name: statDisplay
param.label: Display forum statistics
param.description: Display the forum statistics. IMPORTANT: Kunena/Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard configuration must also allow to show this!

param.name: statRanking
param.label: Ranking
param.description: Display the forum ranking text. IMPORTANT: Kunena/Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard configuration must also allow to show this!

param.name: statRankingImg
param.label: Ranking Slider
param.description: Display the forum ranking graphic

param.name: statPosts
param.label: Total Posts
param.description: Display the forum total posts. IMPORTANT: Kunena/Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard configuration must also allow to show this!

param.name: statKarma
param.label: Karma
param.description: Display the forum karma. IMPORTANT: Kunena/Fireboard/Joomlaboard/Simpleboard configuration must also allow to show this!

param.name: @spacer
param.default: List Settings: see tab configuration: parameters
param.label: Forum Posts:

param.name: postsNumber
param.label: Number of posts to display
param.description: If showing all posts, this is the number of posts per page. If showing only last ones, this is the number of posts to show. Default is 10

param.name: pagingEnabled
param.label: Show all forum posts with paging
param.description: If set to -show all- all forum posts will become visible in the user profile. Otherwise, only the last posts will be visible.

param.name: searchEnabled
param.label: Allow search function
param.description: IMPORTANT: Show all posts must also be set. Allows a search on posts from the user.
